articles.description: With Crudup's exit as Barry Allen's dad, The Flash has found his mom Nora Allen in Spanish actress Maribel Verdú, known for Alfonso Cuarón's Y Tu Mamá También.
articles.content:

articles.title: A Theater Critic Reviews a Year Without Theater - Vulture
articles.description: “Little did I know that night that I’d go into Manhattan only three times in the next 365 days.”
articles.content:
Everybody has a last show.
Mine was The Fre at the Flea. The Flea Theater stayed open just a few days longer than Broadway, so when my uptown show canceled, I switched my tickets for the downtown pr… [+5358 chars]

articles.title: The Wild True Story Behind Lady Gaga and Adam Driver's Gucci Assassination Movie - The Daily Beast
articles.description: The new Discovery+ documentary “Lady Gucci” features shocking interviews with Patrizia Reggiani, who ordered a hit on her soon-to-be ex-husband and fashion giant Maurizio Gucci.
